name: Bounce (itch) (Jenceslav, hesik)
description:
We are a developer duo from the Czech Republic and we would love to share this game with you. Our team consists of Jenceslav for the programming and Hesik for the art. Make sure to check out our other games too! :)

The soundtrack in the menu was composed by Tr4dim (https://soundcloud.com/tr4dim).
